string.text: You must meet the npc first and ask about skills to be able see this section
Cannnot show standings for NPC that are not online (in this map)

- Attitude of the npc towards the player. It includes static goodwill (from faction and rank relations) and dynamic goodwill (personal or faction based, see below) 
 |- %c[d_purple]cannot be increased directly%c[white] 
 |- when below -999, the npc is %c[red]hostile%c[white] 
 |- between 0-999, the npc is %c[gray]neutral%c[white] - you can only hire through squad, chance based (24 hour reset) and only advanced/veteran squads 
 |- when above 999, the npc is %c[green]friendly%c[white] - you can recruit through squad 
 |- when above 1999, the npc is %c[orange]trusted%c[white] - you can recruit through squad or individually, chance based (24 hour reset) and only advanced/veteran squads

- Personal goodwill of the npc towards the player. This is affected by the player's action (e.g. doing tasks, etc). It is the main factor that allows you to individually recruit/hire the npc. 
 |- when below -999, the npc is %c[red]hostile%c[white] 
 |- between 0-499, the npc is %c[gray]neutral%c[white] - you can hire individually, chance based (24 hour reset) and only from advanced/veteran squads 
 |- between 500-999, the npc is %c[blue]respected%c[white] - you can hire individually, only advanced/veteran squads 
 |- between 1000-1499, the npc is %c[green]friendly%c[white] - you can recruit individually, chance based (24 hour reset) from from any squads 
 |- between 1500-2000, the npc is %c[orange]trusted%c[white] - you can recruit individually from any squads 
 |- %c[d_purple][TIP]%c[white] Raise this if you want to release and recruit an npc from a squad

- The goodwill of the npc's faction towards the player. This is affected by the player's action (e.g. doing tasks, etc) towards the faction. 
 |- It will affect the overall attidute of the faction's npcs towards the player. 
 |- It is the same goodwill that is used to establish a trader stock's supply level. 
 |- This will not raise the npcs personal goodwill. 
 |- %c[d_purple][TIP]%c[white] Raise this if you want to start recruiting novice squads
